(a) for stage(s) at which engagement occurs, examples could be in determining
mitigation approaches or in evaluating their effectiveness;
(b) for type of engagement, these could be participation, consultation and/or information;
(c) for the frequency of the engagement, information may be provided on whether
engagement occurs on a regular basis, at certain points in a project or business
